name: Mag Gunner
description:
In Mag Gunner you are steering the MagnaVolta 2000, a powerful vehicle that shoots magnets in the direction it's facing. The magnets wither attract or repel metal crates scattered throughout the seven levels. Use them to squish the infestation of the red Punk Bugs but don't get hit yourself!

This game was created during the Ludum Dare #32 Game Jam. Its theme was “An Unconventional Weapon"

The collisions are a bit glitchy but the game is fully playable until the end. I tried to do my best to have the levels progressing in difficulty so that you learn the mechanic of the MagGun (thanks, Portal!)

Controls:
W A D

Shooting magnets
↓ ↑ (up, down)

Quit
Esc

Screenshot
F12
